document_data.caption: A map showing Dennik in the Korinn Archipelago.
document_data.name: Dennik
document_data.mainbody: '''Dennik''' was an island within the [[Korinn Archipelago]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: Moonshae Isles|11}}
document_data.Geography: Dennik was one of the larger islands found among the northern region of the Korinn Archipelago. The island was relatively featureless and surrounded by a multitude of smaller islands.
document_data.Inhabitants: A few small coastal villages were found on Dennik but were ravaged by pirates on a regular basis.
